text: Ľubica Novotníková-Kurhajcová (born 13 June 1954) is a Slovak rower. She competed at the 1988 Summer Olympics and the 1992 Summer Olympics. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Slovak female rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Czechoslovakia Category:Rowers at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Rowers at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Bratislava
title: Ľubica Novotníková-Kurhajcová
